Title: Flowers of Shanghai
Writer: Eileen Chang (translation), T'ien-wen Chu, Bangqing Han (novel)
Actors: Tony Leung Chiu Wai, Michiko Hada, Michelle Reis, Carina Lau
Plot: Shanghai, the 1880s, four elegant brothels (flower houses): each has an auntie (the madam), a courtesan in her prime, older servants, and maturing girls in training. The men gather around ...
